text: 20:35 Matyu 10:8; 2 Korin 11:9; 11:12; 1 Tesalonika 4:11; 2 Tesalonika 3:8Ezɨ kɨ amizir ingangariba bar, kɨ kamaghɨn ian aka, e pamtemɨn ingangarir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ, egh kamaghɨn, e ingaran iburazir gumazibar akurvagham. Egh ia Ekiam Iesus, a uabɨ mɨkemezir akam gɨnɨghnɨgh, ‘Nɨ bizir aghuarim munav ganɨdir arazim, a bar dera. Egha a nɨ ua baghavɨra biziba isir arazim gafira.’ ”
